title: Ford 8N Tractor and Implements | Building A Homestead In 7 Days

tasks.task: Operating a 1949 tractor for farm tasks
subtasks: Turning on the fuel shut-off and sediment bowl check
Using the battery disconnect switch for safety
Starting the tractor with the starter switch
Maneuvering the tractor into position on the field
Adjusting the disc harrow for ground preparation
Attaching and using the Ferguson double bottom plow
Operating the 19.6 Dearborn back scoop and hilling machine
Utilizing the back blade for snow removal and dirt moving
Maintaining safety measures while using tractor implements
Addressing occasional repairs and modifications (e.g., battery disconnect, rocker switch, transmission selector)
Clearing land using multiple implements and coordinating tractor operations
Responding to potential hazards (e.g., entanglement with old machinery parts)
